comment: If you have an option to take a different course, seriously. Attendance is mandatory, or you will lose much of your final grade. She talks fast and relies heavily on PowerPoint slides; Good luck writing down definitions, she doesn't give enough time. The quizzes are based on your ability to hear, not to learn. Easy A, but not worth sanity.
Took this as a business major needing a random class for an elective. Don't do that. Don't be like me

I really liked Professor Creasy, her lectures were engaging and she cares about her students. I would not advise taking her course if you don't have a background in music or have a habit of truancy (participation and attendance are important in this class), but it was a positive experience for a GenEd.
She is so awesome and funny! She cares about her students and want you to do well!! Quiz heavy....But if you read the textbooks you should do well!!!

While you really have to go to every class to get a good grade, she has a way of making a boring pre req class much more tolerable. Her lectures were engaging and fun, its an easy class, there's just a strict attendance policy.

Crucial to attend class and three concerts. Concert papers graded easy. Don't need to pay attention in class. Do the work and you will pass. Grades are not posted until the end so you will have no idea what you have which was stressful. Do your homework, it's not too much. Don't really need to do textbook readings.

Overall, she's a great professor. This class is VERY lecture heavy, but you don't really need to pay attention to pass. As long as you do the work and concert attendance assignments, you'll pass her class. You can miss three classes in total and it doesn't affect you, so go to class. It goes towards your grade.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: I took this class during maymester and even though it was very fast paced I learned a lot from her. The main assignments is the two recorder tests and two music lesson plans. The planning was very difficult for me but she cut two hours of class time to help us on our planning and use any materials we needed from her class. Definitely take her!

Took her for Maymester and she was awesome! Two lesson plans and recorder tests. She gives great feedback and is eager to help her students. Her grading criteria and lesson planning information is clear. Super easy, quick and painless!
This professor treats you like you are a music major. She is extremely lecture heavy and gives lots and lots of notes. She is also a hard grader and is sometimes impatient.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy--Tough grader

comment: This is a woman that knows that no one wants to take her class electively. So, instead of caring about her students' success, she grades as if we are all Music majors which is absolutely ridiculous. She is cold and does not work with you to solve problems. Do not take her if you value your GPA. It is a real shame bc I was excited for this class.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things

comment: Shes fine. She frustrated the class a lot. Shes a tough grader when it comes to grading lesson plans. She doesnt post grades on D2L so surprise! You find out if you pass or fail after its too late. try to not be sick because she questioned the fact I was in bed with a fever WITH a doctors note. I emailed her too. Still didnt believe I was sick
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things

comment: This class is awful whatever professor you take. She is honestly not that bad its just the material that sucks. If you have fun with this class, it will bee 1000% better.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Participation matters--Graded by few things

comment: YES!!!! love love love Professor Creasy! She is so understanding, hilarious, and a GREAT teacher! I took her for a Maymester. The peer teaching lessons are stressful, but she helps so much to make sure you're prepared.

Dr. Creasy was such a knowledgeable & kind professor who taught us so much abt music in the classroom! Participation is Mandatory cause it's a grade. She treats the class like we are Elem. students which can be odd but is helpful for the 2 Teaching Presentations ur doing for her class when u present. Easy Reflections & 2 Recorder Skills Tests.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Dr. Creasy is a great music teacher. She really breaks down the material so everyone can read music and succeed. I took for Maymester and the class was fast paced but simple. Grade consisted of two teaching assignments (which she walks through and helps out) and two recorder skills test.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Graded by few things

comment: Hard with musical knowledge. The further you get into the class, the more this can actually be a disadvantage, as I found out the hard way. Education major class, but taught somewhere between Educ and Music Ed class, more on the basic, but later said. She gives you her email and info and says you can contact her. She means it! Will help. Recorder

Dr. Creasy is awesome! Such a fun class that I loved very much. Had 2 teaching assignments that were scary to do but she is very kind about them. Gives a lot of info prior to teaching units. Do not use the book but maybe twice, not worth buying! Overall great quality, fun class!

Loved this class! Every class was fun and interactive. No tests! Just teaching and recorder test. Attendance is not mandatory BUT every class is important to your peer teaching and/or recorder test. She is very helpful too! & Funny! I definitely recommend her!
Great Teacher! She really cares about her students learning! Such a fun class, i had no interest in music prior to class but now i love music for kids!

Dr. Creasy has been the best professor I have had at Kennesaw! I was not too thrilled about taking a music class because I cannot sing or play an instrument. She made the class easy, fun, passable for any student! She is willing to go above and beyond to make you sure you will pass her class. I loved her class!!

Absolutely the most fun that I have had in the education program hands down! Dr. Creasy is so amazing, take her take her! I had a blast, do the work, follow the guidelines and you will come out with an A. She is so helpful

She was awesome! SO nice and funny! i didn't know anything about music before and she makes it fun and interesting. she treats everyone so well and makes class fun and interesting. Definitly suggest taking her!!!

This is a crazy class and you will be treated like a little kid at times, but it is only to show how to teach the lessons. This is def. a fun class if you put just a little bit of effort into it. She knows what she is doing. Take her is you can! Easy A!
No Comments
